item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

"SATURDAY, APRIL 30TH CONCERT!

Ritmo Masacote Cubano's Night
Experience the Cubano's Night Excitement!

8:30-9:00pm
FREE Rueda Lesson
by DC Casineros

9:00pm SHOWTIME!

10:30pm Special performances by DC Casineros and Amanda & Adrian

Only $12 ALL NIGHT!

By popular demand, Ritmo Masacote is back at Ryles Jazz Club. $12 for Live Music? You can't beat that!

Come hang with the Masacote family in a very warm and welcoming atmosphere. You can come in early for dinner and stay late for all the high energy the band provides for non-stop dancing. We will also have great Cuban/Timba music spinning between sets!

We love the roots, the culture and the feel that Afro-Cuban Music provides and we are trying to build a stronger appreciation for it, so help us spread the word!

Experience the Excitement!"

Unfortunately we can not reserve tables but if we get there early we can all try to sit close together....

 

See you there !!!!!

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a black fedora hat.!!!!
item.why: The band is always a fun time !!!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Ritmo Masacote is back at Ryles Jazz Club !!!!!
